title: Ethylene oxide graft copolymers reduce the immunogenicity of lipid nanoparticles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30071-30076
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05007J, Paper

Yalin Qi, Hesong Han, Albert Liu, Sheng Zhao, Atip Lawanprasert, Josefine Eilsø Nielsen, Hema Choudhary, Dengpan Liang, Annelise E. Barron, Niren Murthy
LNPs made with the polyamide PGE have low immunogenicity and outperform PEG-LNPs after chronic administration.
